titles.title: Holy Is The Lord And Mighty Is His Name

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Holy is the Lord and mighty is His Name,
King of heaven yet down to earth He came.
Angels sing His praise, all earth shall do the same.
Holy is the Lord and mighty is His Name.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Righteousness and truth will reign in man again.
Christ in you shall conquer all within.
Then we'll sing and shout His praises and His fame.
Holy is the Lord and mighty is his Name.
